page.title: 11SUTTON PARK ESTATE,GUILDFORD
page.content: Built in 1520s,Sutton Place remained in possession of the Weston family until 1920. It has since been owned by the Duke of Sutherland and J Paul Getty. In 1980 estate sold to Anglo- Texan Property Company, then leased to Stanley J Seeger who has been the inspiration and motivation behind the exstensive renovation of the house and landscaping the garden. Seeger moved pemanently abroad having set up Sutton Place Heritage Trust with three aims - to preserve and maintain the house and 1000 acres of land (some land leased to farmers), to encourage performing and visual arts,to provide an area for conservation.It is no longer a family home.The Estate is open to the public by appointment only for the following activities - ecology walks, garden and house tours, art exhibitions and concerts followed by teas and dinners.
